companyProfile.companyDescription: Tata Steel Limited is an India-based global steel company with an annual crude steel capacity of approximately 35 million tons per annum. The Company is primarily engaged in the business of manufacturing and distribution of steel products across the globe. The Company and its subsidiaries have a presence across the value chain of steel manufacturing, from mining and processing iron ore and coal to producing and distributing finished products. Its products include cold rolled (Non-branded), BP sheets, Galvano, HR commercial, hot rolled pickled and oiled and hot rolled skin passed pickled and oiled, high tensile steel strapping, pre-engineered buildings, projects/ tenders, construction and projects, and full hard cold rolled. The Company's brands include MagiZinc, Ymagine, Ympress, Contiflo, Strongbox, SAB Profil, Fischer Profil, Montana, Advantica, Fischertherm, Fischerfireproof, Montanatherm, Montapanel, Swiss Panel, Holorib, Serica, MagiZinc Auto, HyperForm, HILUMIN and Colorcoat.

recentNews.headline: Nifty Metal on track for best weekly rally in 4 years amid easing trade tensions
recentNews.intro: Tata Steel, Adani Enterprises, Hindustan Copper, Vedanta, and Hindalco Industries have gained up to 14% so far this week as easing US-China trade tensions boost investor confidence in metal stocks. The Nifty Metal index surged 9.17%, marking its largest weekly gain since May 2021.
recentNews.imagecaption: Copper Is Beating Gold. What Lies Ahead for the Bronze Metal?s Rally.

recentNews.headline: JM Financial launches India model portfolio with bullish bets on banks, infra and defence
recentNews.intro: JM Financial's new Model Portfolio favors banks and infrastructure, reflecting optimism in economic recovery. However, it notes persistent earnings downgrades and high valuations, urging investors to be selective and balance exposure across different market caps.
recentNews.imagecaption: JM Financial launches India model portfolio with bullish bets on banks, infra and defence

recentNews.headline: Tata Steel, SAIL, JSPL, JSW Steel rise up to 4% after THIS India's snub to US at WTO
recentNews.intro: Stock Market Today: Tata Steel, SAIL, JSPL, JSW Steel share prices gained up to slightly more than 4% in the morning trades on Wednesday  after THIS India's snub to US at WTO. check details
recentNews.imagecaption: Stock Market Today: Steel stocks rise more than 4%

recentNews.headline: JSW-Bhushan case: Time to rewrite India?s insolvency code?
recentNews.intro: The Supreme Court?s scrapping of a big acquisition by JSW Steel Ltd raises troubling questions over the efficacy of India?s Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code (IBC). Should we reform it? If so, along what lines?
recentNews.imagecaption: The Supreme Court found serious misconduct in the way BPSL?s resolution was carried out. (ANI)

recentNews.headline: Tata Steel Q4 Results: Net profit jumps 117% YoY to  ?1,201 crore, dividend of  ?3.60 declared. Check record date here
recentNews.intro: Tata Steel recorded a 117% YoY jump in its Jan-Mar quarter net profits to  ?1,201 crore. The board also declared a dividend issue of  ?3.60 along with its ?Record Date.? Steel maker's shares closed higher ahead of the Q4 results announcement.
recentNews.imagecaption: Tata Steel announced its fourth quarter results on Monday, May 12, 2025.

recentNews.headline: Tata Steel share price up 3% ahead of Q4 results. Do you own?
